42 class NumberPickerItem : public baseItem //menu item used to display and pick a number (increment/decrement)
43 {
44 protected:
45  int _data;
46  std::string _name;
47  std::string _targetValue;
48 public:
49  NumberPickerItem(std::string name, std::string targetValue, int value = 0):_name(name),_targetValue(targetValue),_data(value){type = NumberPickerItemT;}
50  void decrement(){--_data; sendMessage(_targetValue, std::to_string(_data));}
51  void increment(){++_data; sendMessage(_targetValue, std::to_string(_data));}
52  int getData(){ return _data; }
53  std::string getName(){return _name;}
54 };

56 class CheckerItem : public baseItem
57 {
58 protected:
59  bool data;
60  std::string _name;
61  Command* _ifFalse;
62  Command* _ifTrue;
63 public:
64  CheckerItem(std::string name, Command* ifFalse, Command* ifTrue): _name(name),_ifFalse(ifFalse), _ifTrue(ifTrue) {type = CheckerItemT;}
65  void toggle()
66  {
67  data = !data;
68  data ? _ifTrue->Execute() : _ifFalse->Execute();
69  sendMessage("data", data ? "true" : "false");
70  }
71

73  {
74  return data;
75  }
